principal_id.description: Identifier for the principal. Scheme intentionally unspecified at spec-first stage (key, DID, registry ref, etc.).

name.description: Optional human-readable name or style. Not required and not assumed to be unique.

notes.description: Optional notes for local display. Avoid personal data where possible.

display.description: Optional display metadata. Implementations should avoid treating display fields as identity proof.

identifiers.description: Optional additional identifiers (aliases, refs). Left open to preserve flexibility.

capabilities.description: Optional declared capability hints. Non-normative and implementation-specific.

revocation_ref.description: Pointer or mechanism enabling verifiers to check whether this principal record is superseded or revoked.

proof.description: Optional proof material (signatures, attestations). Intentionally unspecified at spec-first stage.
